page.title: 09LOCAL BUSINESSES,BUCHLYVIE
page.content: Although the majority of the people in the village travel to the larger towns of {STIRLING and GLASGOW}to find employment there are a number of small businesses within the village. Two {hairdressing salons}cater for both ladies and gentlemen within the village. A long established{joinery {business}is run from workshops in Whiteleys Road. This business also provides an undertaking service. Two {woodcutting businesses}supply residents and outlying areas with logs and kindling wood and a small{plumbers {business}operates from the owner's home.{A road haulage company}operates from premises in Station Road and provides occasional employment for local drivers.{The West End Garage, also locally owned, provides for the servicing and repairs of cars as well as supplying petrol and diesel oil.
